titleStmt.title: Newes from Spaine The king of Spaines edict, for the expulsion & banishment of more then nine hundred thousand Moores out of his kingdome, which conspired and plotted to bring the kingdome of Spaine vnder the power and subiection of the Turkes and Saracens. Translated out of Spanish into English by W.I.
Proclamations. 1611. English
titleStmt.author: Spain. Sovereign (1598-1621 : Philip III)
W. I., fl. 1611.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By E. Allde] for Nathaniel Butter, and are to be solde at his shop at the signe of the pide-Bull neere St. Austins gate,
